ti:edition.ti:label: Πρὸς τὸν εἰπόντα Προμηθεὺς εἶ ἐν λόγοις
ti:edition.ti:description: Lucian. Luciani Samosatensis Opera, Vol. 1. Jacobitz, Karl, editor. Leipzig: Teuber, 1909.

ti:edition.ti:label: Πρὸς τὸν εἰπόντα, Προμηθεὺς εἴ εἶ ἐν λόγοις
ti:edition.ti:description: Lucian, Vol. 6. Kilburn, K., editor. London: William Heinemann, Ltd.; Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1959.

ti:translation.ti:label: To one who said "You're a Prometheus in words."
ti:translation.ti:description: Lucian, Vol. 6. Kilburn, K., translator. London: William Heinemann, Ltd.; Cambridge, MA: Harvard University Press, 1959.

ti:translation.ti:label: A Literary Prometheus
ti:translation.ti:description: The Works of Lucian of Samosata, complete, with exceptions specified in thepreface, Vol. 1. Fowler, H. W. and Fowlere, F.G., translators. Oxford at the Clarendon Press, 1905.
